page.title: 18Mr.Phillips the Herbalist.
page.content: { Mr.Phillips}has learnt all about the old craft of{herbalism}and started a practice in Yockleton.The difference between a herbalist and a doctor is that a herbalist only uses medicines made from plants and is not allowed to do operations.He had to study many of the same things as a doctor,like anatomy and all about diseases.He had to learn about plants and which dis- eases they can cure. His patients come from all over Shrop -shire.Some come much further than the doctors patients.He cannot have a lot of patients because it takes him about an hour to listen to each one.He sees patients in a special room in his own house.He sends away for special medi- cines for patients.He hopes to make his own medicines when he has time.He says a balanced diet,without additives is very important for good health.
